hero.desc: I'm a student from Treuchtlingen, Bavaria, who likes designing and building out Apps, Websites and everything in between.

about.p1: Hi, I'm Flo, student and hobby-developer from Treuchtlingen, Bavaria.
about.p2: With the help of modern and upcoming technologies, I develop websites and apps, always having the same goal: Offering an experience as smooth and detailed as possible.
about.p3: Since my internship at the company Alfmeier, I've been following Software-Engineering with great interest while realizing own projects on the side.
about.p4: Here are a few technologies and tools I have recently been working with:

contact.p1: Convinced by the portfolio? Questions for me? No matter what you want to know, my inbox is always open. Write an e-mail to
